snippet: Goldman Sachs has sold $2.5 billion of shares in the Industrial & Commercial Bank of China to the Singaporean sovereign wealth fund Temasek Holdings and other institutional shareholders.
abstract: Goldman Sachs has sold $2.5 billion of shares in the Industrial & Commercial Bank of China to the Singaporean sovereign wealth fund Temasek Holdings and other institutional shareholders.

headline.main: Goldman Sachs Sells Shares in China Bank for $2.5 Billion
